Test Name: UA Microscopic Only (Urine Sediment Microscopic Examination)
Purpose: To evaluate the presence and quantity of formed elements in urine (cells, casts, crystals, organisms) through microscopic examination.
Container: Sterile urine collection container (sample transferred to a sterile centrifuge tube for analysis)
Equipment: Centrifuge, manual light microscope (phase-contrast capable), glass slides and coverslips, transfer pipettes, sterile centrifuge tubes
